name: saka
description: A keyboard interface to the web

scripts.build: echo "You must specify the target browser (firefox or chrome). Example: npm run build:firefox"
scripts.build:prod: echo "You must specify the target browser (firefox or chrome). Example: npm run build:firefox:prod"
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --env target=chrome:benchmark    --progress --color
scripts.build:chrome:prod: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production  --env target=chrome:nobenchmark  --progress --color
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --env target=firefox:benchmark   --progress --color
scripts.build:firefox:prod: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production  --env target=firefox:nobenchmark --progress --color
scripts.build:profile: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --profile --color && cp ./static/* ./dist
